title: Week 16 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 12/20)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 16 gambling advice, covering all 16 games on Saturday, Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Rams-49ers (4:45), Bills-Patriots (8:20), Bucs-Texans (12:45), Bengals-Dolphins (17:45), Eagles-Cowboys (21:45), Packers-Vikings (28:35), Cardinals-Seahawks (32:30), Jags-Falcons (35:45), Browns-Ravens (45:30), Chiefs-Bears (48:00), Jets-Steelers (50:00), Titans-Saints (53:25), Giants-Redskins (55:30), Lions-Broncos (57:45), Raiders-Chargers (59:25) and Panthers-Colts (1:01:45).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
